name: Christmas Tree Defenders
description:
A Christmas adventure in which teenagers protect the city Christmas tree from scary snowmen. You will find an ever-increasing complexity, atmospheric music and a lot of fun.

Game controls

LBM - Fast Atack (more fun with her)

Push LBM  - targeted attack

A - move left.

D - move right

W - move forward

S - move back

Space - jump

LBM - Atack

Push LBM  - targeted attack

Team

Max Potashev - game design, project management.

Vitalii Sobaken - programming

Denis Shkanov - narrative designer

Danil Tikhomirov - music/sound design

Mikhail Tarasov - digital art, animation.

Olesa Tarasova - digital art.

Leila- digital art.

Aleksandr Kammari - digital art.

Leona Razumovskay - Concept art
